title: Ep. #39 | Catching Up: Amber Liu
description:
Finally! This week, Amber joins Eric to discuss all things f(x) and her 2nd EP, X.

Being one of the first foreign K-pop idols in Korea wasn’t easy. Amber shares the importance of mentorship in the industry, her experience transitioning back to L.A., and the stories she wishes to convey with her new music. Also, Amber sucks face?! 

Make sure to subscribe to @daebakshow (IT’S FREE) and leave a comment, rating and/or review on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, Soundcloud, and YouTube.

Episodes are presented by @thedivestudios

Connect with us on all social media platforms @daebakshow and at http://www.divestudios.io/daebakshow !

SUPPORT & JOIN DIVE Studios' Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/divestudios

#EricNam #AmberLiu #fx #Kpop #DaebakShow #DIVEStudios
